title: Six Degrees of Desperation
description: Justice is not served when the justice system favors criminals instead of victims. Vigilante justice is at the center of Blake Franklin's latest case. Revenge is a dessert best served cold; there is nothing like dessert to finish a final meal.Uncover the Vigilante Justice in Six Degrees of Desperation .Social Equity instead of Criminal Justice is a recipe for disorder.Blake Franklin Series with Texas Investigator's Pursuit of Justice in Ryan Hale Books. Must Read gripping stories of justice .
author: Ryan   Hale
